mapper.select: select pro_no as proNo, pro_title as proTitle, pro_progress as proProgress, pro_start_date as proStartDate, pro_end_date as proEndDate, pro_member_no as proMemberNo from project where pro_member_no = #{memberNo}
select pro_title as proTitle from project where pro_member_no = #{proMemberNo} and pro_no = #{proNo}

select p.post_no as postNo, p.post_title as postTitle, p.post_progress as postProgress, p.post_date as postDate, p.post_content as postContent, p.post_writer as postWriter, p.post_temp as postTemp, p.post_pro_no as postProNo, p.post_tag as postTag, m.member_name as memberName, m.member_picture as memberPicture from post p left join member m on p.post_writer = m.member_no where post_pro_no = #{currentProNo}

select p.post_no as postNo, p.post_title as postTitle, p.post_progress as postProgress, p.post_date as postDate, p.post_content as postContent, p.post_writer as postWriter, p.post_temp as postTemp, p.post_pro_no as postProNo, p.post_tag as postTag, m.member_name as memberName, m.member_picture as memberPicture from post p left join member m on p.post_writer = m.member_no where p.post_pro_no = #{currentProNo} and m.member_name like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%' or p.post_title like '%'||#{searchKeyword}||'%'

select pro_no as proNo, pro_title as proTitle, pro_progress as proProgress, pro_start_date as proStartDate, pro_end_date as proEndDate, pro_member_no as proMemberNo from project where pro_member_no = #{memberNo}

select p.post_no as postNo, p.post_title as postTitle, p.post_progress as postProgress, p.post_date as postDate, p.post_content as postContent, p.post_writer as postWriter, p.post_temp as postTemp, p.post_pro_no as postProNo, p.post_tag as postTag, m.member_name as memberName, m.member_picture as memberPicture, pr.pro_title as proTitle from post p left join member m on (p.post_writer = m.member_no) left join project pr on(p.post_pro_no = pr.pro_no) where p.post_pro_no = #{postProNo} and p.post_writer = #{postWriter}
